MemoryInfobox.description: 'The wealthy Piracy|pirate queen, Xenia, offered Kassandra more riches in exchange for Triton's legendary {{Wiki|Conch|conch shell}}.'

General_Description: '''She Who Controls the Seas''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra accepted another request of the [[Piracy|pirate]] lord, [[Xenia]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra approached Xenia.
*'''Xenia:''' ''So, my West Wind returns.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It seems I've picked up your taste for treasure hunting.''
*'''Xenia:''' ''Is there no greater passion?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So, what do you have for me?''
*'''Xenia:''' ''A group of [[bandit]]s has put their hands on [[Triton]]'s conch shell. They think it has the power to control the tides. Many would want such a thing. Will you bring it to me?''

<tabber>
|-|I will get the treasure.=
Xenia gives her three maps of the rumored locations of the bandits' lair, and Kassandra receives them agonizingly.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''More maps?''
*'''Xenia:''' ''How else would you find the bandits? Go on now, I want that shell.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''From your lips to the gods' ears, it will be in your possession.''
*'''Xenia:''' ''It is your work that gives me riches, not theirs.''
|-|No, not right now.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm in the middle of something.''
Kassandra returns.
*'''Xenia:''' ''The West Wind! Are you here to retrieve Triton's conch shell for me?''
(Back to dialogue choice one.)
</tabber>
(If players choose "What's so special about this shell?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Sounds like quite the story. Is the shell at least made of gold?''
*'''Xenia:''' ''My friend, in our time together... Would you think I'd be interested in such an object if it were not made of gold?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Are you sure you're not trying to control the tides?''
*'''Xenia:''' ''Only fools think they can move the sea.''
(If players choose "Who are these bandits?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Do you know anything about the bandits that have it?''
*'''Xenia:''' ''They're bandits. They steal and kill. What more is there to know?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Hmm. I could easily describe you and your pirates the same way.''
*'''Xenia:''' ''You want to know how we differ? Take a look around you. I have an island. Them? They have a hole in the ground.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I see.''
(Leave - "I'll go find that shell.")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll be back with your shell.''
Having recovered the shell, Kassandra returned to Xenia.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I have what you need.''
Xenia held out a hand open.
*'''Xenia:''' ''Give it here then.''

<tabber>
|-|For you, my friend.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''One shell, delivered safe and sound to the Queen of the Sea.''
*'''Xenia:''' ''Your services are appreciated.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Let me know if you need anything else.''
|-|This'll cost you extra.=
Kassandra reaches from her pocket and hands her the shell.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Any trip that involves me diving into an underwater cave doubles the cost.''
Xenia smiles.
*'''Xenia:''' ''I'm not sure what the better addition to my collection is, this shell, or the one holding it.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It's always a pleasure to have your [[drachma]]e jingling in my pouch, Xenia.''
</tabber>
Section_Outcome: Kassandra recovered Triton's conch shell for Xenia.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
